title: Coinsday
author: Coinsday
content: The idea: You pay monthly subcription with btc, eth,trx,usdt,bnb.In return you get weekly / monthly 10x-1000x coins.Off course either every Week or month you can receive some lottery kind of rewards aswell from the total ammount of the coins either coins collected from subcription fees or small 10x-1000x coins.With btc and bigger coins i could buy the most of the coins If they Are cheap and presale stage.Im ready to use escrow here. - guys If you have any suggestions or opinion then you Are feel Free to say something about my project and idea here. Thank you!

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Coinsday on August 06, 2023, 09:29:29 PMThe idea: You pay monthly subcription with btc, eth,trx,usdt,bnb.In return you get weekly / monthly 10x-1000x coins.You are promoting a Ponzi scheme how on Earth can you pay people with 10x - 1000x profit if you do not have a business to back up your project, you cannot sustain it and the forum do not tolerate projects like Ponzi scheme you just sign up hre thinking that you can make money here.QuoteIm ready to use escrow here. - guys If you have any suggestions or opinion then you Are feel Free to say something about my project and idea here. Thank you! I suggest that you get out of this forum we don't want your idea your only goal is to scam people with your Ponzi scheme

comments.author: Coinsday
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on August 06, 2023, 10:13:40 PMQuote from: Coinsday on August 06, 2023, 09:29:29 PMThe idea: You pay monthly subcription with btc, eth,trx,usdt,bnb.In return you get weekly / monthly 10x-1000x coins.You are promoting a Ponzi scheme how on Earth can you pay people with 10x - 1000x coin if you do not have a business to back up your project, you cannot sustain it and the forum do not tolerate projects like Ponzi scheme you just sign up hre thinking that you can make money here.QuoteIm ready to use escrow here. - guys If you have any suggestions or opinion then you Are feel Free to say something about my project and idea here. Thank you! I suggest that you get out of this forum we don't want your idea your only goal is to scam people with your Ponzi scheme This one has nothing to do with ponzi scheme.Do you Understood what's the plan ? I'll explain again then 10x-1000x coins means i'll buy the coins what's cheap on presale stage on bulk and distribute to subcribers. I collect funds from the monthly subcription fees and then using that funds to buy large basket of cheap coins what's on sale on presale.

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: Quote from: Coinsday on August 07, 2023, 03:04:17 AMThis one has nothing to do with ponzi scheme.Do you Understood what's the plan ? I'll explain again then 10x-1000x coins means i'll buy the coins what's cheap on presale stage on bulk and distribute to subcribers. I collect funds from the monthly subcription fees and then using that funds to buy large basket of cheap coins what's on sale on presale.Can you create an illustration on the trickle model of your coin project, I want to see if it really is a Ponzi scheme and I'm sure that others would want to see it too. From what I understand, you're trying to collect money so you can buy cheap pre-sale tokens? If that's what that is then I don't think you will find anyone that will be interested in your project here because you're taking the money without the guarantee that those pre-sale tokens will increase in value.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Weekly/Monthly? What if there are no prospective projects in that term?Or don't say that you mean you have to buy randomly regardless of the conditions because you have to take profits from the funds collected.There are thousands of shittokens being depolyed daily with an expectation of 100-1000x returns with no apparent utility. https://thebittimes.com/list-coins-BSC.html

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Coinsday on August 07, 2023, 03:04:17 AMThis one has nothing to do with ponzi scheme.Do you Understood what's the plan ? I'll explain again then 10x-1000x coins means i'll buy the coins what's cheap on presale stage on bulk and distribute to subcribers. I collect funds from the monthly subcription fees and then using that funds to buy large basket of cheap coins what's on sale on presale.However I looked at your plan, subscribers if you will have one, are the ones who are going to lose here, you will decide what coins to buy you distributed to them while you make money from their subscription, you are such a genius to think that people are so idiot to buy your ideaÂ  .I'll just buy the coin by myself instead of you deciding for me and paying you for your distribution service

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Coinsday on August 06, 2023, 09:29:29 PMThe idea: You pay monthly subcription with btc, eth,trx,usdt,bnb.In return you get weekly / monthly 10x-1000x coins.Off course either every Week or month you can receive some lottery kind of rewards aswell from the total ammount of the coins either coins collected from subcription fees or small 10x-1000x coins.With btc and bigger coins i could buy the most of the coins If they Are cheap and presale stage.How did you come out with this idea you are going o make a profit from subscription, and what's a guarantee that your subscriber is going to make a profit seeing that coins that are on pre-sale or cheap end up as shitcoin, some pre-sale coins do not even land in the market. QuoteI'm ready to use escrow here. - guys If you have any suggestions or opinion then you Are feel Free to say something about my project and idea here. Thank you! You're making money without losing anything while those on your subscription are going to lose, and what's your credibility that you are good at picking the right coin to distribute, I've seen outrageous ideas here in Bitcointalk but so far this is the worse of all, I'll bookmark this thread and maybe in the future I can include this as one the most outrageous offer if there's a discussion on this.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Coinsday on August 06, 2023, 09:29:29 PMThe idea: You pay monthly subcription with btc, eth,trx,usdt,bnb.In return you get weekly / monthly 10x-1000x coins.Off course either every Week or month you can receive some lottery kind of rewards aswell from the total ammount of the coins either coins collected from subcription fees or small 10x-1000x coins.With btc and bigger coins i could buy the most of the coins If they Are cheap and presale stage.Im ready to use escrow here. - guys If you have any suggestions or opinion then you Are feel Free to say something about my project and idea here. Thank you! I think you don't understand the market condition to offer something like this, not all new coins or coins that we see in presale have potential in the market, and you did not even show your expertise in choosing what coins to buy to distribute what is your authority for people to trust you and send you their money to pick coins for them when they can do it all by themselves.I don't know where you get this idea but there should be a level of authority for you to convince people of your idea, something that you failed to show.

comments.author: God bless u
comments.body: Quote from: Coinsday on August 07, 2023, 03:04:17 AMThis one has nothing to do with ponzi scheme.Do you Understood what's the plan ? I'll explain again then 10x-1000x coins means i'll buy the coins what's cheap on presale stage on bulk and distribute to subcribers. I collect funds from the monthly subcription fees and then using that funds to buy large basket of cheap coins what's on sale on presale.almost al Presale has locking period and only 10% given to Presale buyer in the TGE where coin price dumping hard after listing. could you mark some projects you think if you were given fund you will take part in these projects presale so we know what kind of projects you are looking for ?

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: Quote from: Coinsday on August 06, 2023, 09:29:29 PMThe idea: You pay monthly subcription with btc, eth,trx,usdt,bnb.In return you get weekly / monthly 10x-1000x coins.Off course either every Week or month you can receive some lottery kind of rewards aswell from the total ammount of the coins either coins collected from subcription fees or small 10x-1000x coins.With btc and bigger coins i could buy the most of the coins If they Are cheap and presale stage.Im ready to use escrow here. - guys If you have any suggestions or opinion then you Are feel Free to say something about my project and idea here. Thank you! the project model that you offer is like a ponzi scheme, where people make deposits and then they will get tempting rewards. no matter what argument you give, be 100% sure that this is a ponzi scheme and will definitely be a scam.especially to convince people to believe in you, first you need to build a reputation in this forum. how is it possible that people will believe in a newbie who just joined 1 day? do you think that there are people who will believe you here?

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: God bless u on August 10, 2023, 01:01:25 AMcould you mark some projects you think if you were given fund you will take part in these projects presale so we know what kind of projects you are looking for ? There is none unless you're looking for scam projects. A decent presale requires a large sum of money most of the time with strict criteria, which is why only VC or whales can enter the first stage. There is no way OP will be able to make a deal from the monthly subscription fees he collected. Even if he can, there is no incentive for him to keep his promise since he can easily pick worthless coins to distribute to his users. Don't fall for his scam.

comments.author: Jocuserious
comments.body: Stop tempting people and this is definitely a deluded idea. Crypto investors know that it is impossible to get rich suddenly from crypto and there are very few people who can get such an opportunity. Moreover, the coins in your list are the best in this crypto market but investors invest according to their needs. Also the profit margin from crypto is not very high where your conversation is 10x-1000x worthless.
